# Podcast Generated by AI

<img width="1024" height="1024" alt="ChatGPT Image 4 de nov  de 2025, 02_59_34" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d378451d-f987-4b20-aedb-854641c841e8" />

A project aimed at generating a podcast using AI tools through more elaborate prompts.

Use a prompt conveyor belt to generate each step of the creative process.

- Script generated via chatgpt  

- Audio generated by [https://www.text-to-speech.online/]    

- ChatGPT for generating covers  

- Capcut for processing audio and adding background sounds.
